text: @TheRickWilson That's a good point...THEY might sign a waiver not to sue TuckFrump or his campaign if they get infected with COVID-19 but we haven't signed a waiver! If I turn up with the infection and can show contact with one of these morons, we can sue them! Hot damn, honey, call our lawyer!
